## Type

- [ ] New example
- [ ] Schema update

- [ ] Breaking spec change

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Spec text uses RFC 2119 keywords correctly (MUST, SHOULD, MAY)
- [ ] JSON examples validate against schemas in `schemas/`
- [ ] No breaking changes without RFC process (issue + 30-day discussion)
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md if applicable
